Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said. "These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web," he said.

It was a different Allen Iverson in this contest as he dominated on the offensive end and came within four points of a career high, hitting 14-of-26 from the floor and 15-of-17 from the foul line. It would have been better to have a one-point performance and win than having a 40-point game and lose, said Allen Iverson , who added seven rebounds and six assists. Ms. Barbara Walters picked up on the fact that he seemed to know the difference in the various states of mind and asked whether he spoke from experience with depression and whether he is on medication to treat it now. I get medicinal help for depression, Mr. David Letterman said. With millions of Americans affected by depression, the news of another high-profile person battling the problem is perhaps as comforting to hear as Mr. David Letterman 's admission was surprising to hear by others.
